intro1: My name is Prince Magnus Mousecastle, the Governor of the Royal Palace.
intro2: Today you can discover some of the secrets of my palace if you find the 7 game boxes upstairs.
clue: If you solve the riddle and discover the password, you can collect your prize, a 'gold coin' or a sticker with an image of the palace at the Tourinform Office!
hint: I can help you with a clue to the password:
dessertHint: It's my friend, Count Chester Gorgonzola's favorite dessert!

0.question: Baron Alexander Castlehouse has found some lovely wall paintings in the entrance hall. What is the part of the angel's foot that is closest to you?

1.question: When I was little, Grandma Minka told me a story about how the Count built this beautiful palace. At first, he built just a small part. As time went on and the Count had more money, he kept adding to the palace. Now there's plenty of space for all of us! What is the Count's family name?

2.question:
Here in the Palace, we have had many guests.
King Franz Joseph I spent a lot of time here, but he was always working. I found that very boring! What am I doing in the picture?

3.question: If you had looked out of this window 150 years ago, you would have seen a gorgeous lake. The lake was named after the animals that swam in it. The lake was named after the animals that swam on it.

4.question: Queen Elisabeth had beautiful long hair that took hours to brush every day. While her maids brushed her hair, she would study languages, including Greek and Ancient Greek. Here in Gödöllő, Queen Elisabeth spoke this language with her youngest daughter, Marie Valerie:

5.question: Queen Elisabeth was very fit because she loved sports. Her favorite was...

6.question: The royal couple's youngest daughter, Marie Valerie, lived in this beautiful sky blue suite. Princess Marie Valerie had a very strict schedule, she had a lot to study. My friend, Count Chester Gorgonzola, was often inspired by the Princess. What will the Count do when he goes home?

introToAllQs: Click and answer all the questions, then click to solve the password!
pwdExplanation1: Look at each clue like 5/2. This means take the second letter from your fifth answer.
pwdExplanation2: Collect all the letters needed to fill in the password.
pwdExplanation3: When you're done, press submit to see what to do next!
submissionQ: Almost there! Maybe take another look at your password.
congrats: Congratulations on solving the riddle and discovering the password!
goToTourinform: Now, go to the Tourinform office to collect your prize!
goToNostalgia: And don't forget to visit the Nostalgiafoto shop!
farewell: We hope to see you again soon!
question: Question
